purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of solutions provided to a functional or organic requirement.

inscope.li: identification of a solution responding to a functional or organic requirement;
identification of a solution provided by a particular organization;
description of a solution refining another solution;
identification of the parts used by a solution;
items within the scope of application module Person organization assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1013;
items within the scope of application module Physical breakdown, ISO/TS 10303-1215;
items within the scope of application module Product occurrence, ISO/TS 10303-1063.

outscope.li: description of the requirements resolved by a solution.

uof.name: Alternative_solution
uof.description: The Alternative_solution UoF specifies the data structure to describe the variants for a product component or for a product function.
